Arimaa Free

Sep 7, 2016

Play Store Github

Android port of a chess-like board game - designed to be difficult for computers to play. AI players have very recently beaten humans! The original Arimaa can be found here. (warning: not a modern website)

It was fun to design a system for rewinding and replaying games move by move. I ended up using a string notation for recording actions augmented from the standard. Despite being intimidating, it was also fun to generate the recursive set of legal moves for the UI. Not too proud of the “GameEngine” class though…
